# Architecture Decisions

> High-level technical decisions for this project.
> Update this file when making significant architectural choices.
> This helps AI agents understand your project's technical context.

## Technology Stack

### Language & Runtime

- Runtime: [e.g., Node.js 20+, Python 3.11+]

### Framework & Libraries
- Framework: [e.g., React, Next.js, FastAPI, Rails]
- Key Libraries: [List major dependencies]

### Database & Storage
- Database: [e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL]
- Caching: [e.g., Redis, in-memory]
- File Storage: [e.g., S3, local filesystem]

### Application Structure
- Pattern: [e.g., MVC, Clean Architecture, Microservices]
- Rationale: [Why this pattern was chosen]

- Approach: [e.g., Redux, Zustand, Context API]
- Rationale: [Why this approach was chosen]

### API Design
- Style: [e.g., REST, GraphQL, gRPC]
- Versioning: [e.g., /api/v1/, header-based]
- Authentication: [e.g., JWT, OAuth2, API keys]

- Session Management: [e.g., 24h expiry, refresh tokens]
